features.text: Recent release notes shown at log in.
features.reasoning: We'd like to show you what we've been up to! If you find these notifications annoying, please let us know. We have an upcoming task to opt out of these.

Feedback is great - especially the "bad stuff" so we know where we can improve. To make it easier for you, we added a convenient form tucked away in the bottom-right corner of your screen. Send us feedback as often as you'd like!

bugs.text: Resolved user authentication issues encountered after viewing demos.

tweaks.text: Users with outdated clients are prompted to refresh.
